5.text: So you thought it was the end of the story.

12.text: You thought that one single event that one single moment was enough for him to stand amongst the greats.

21.text: Sleep. 'I don't sleep.' You thought that was it.

33.text: This is the art where you re-invent yourself.

37.text: It's time to get tested, to test your will, your endurance, it's time to test your art, to test your limits.

46.text: No weekends, no holidays, no birthdays. Listen to me! No days off!

53.text: It's about gaining the competitive edge.

58.text: You can't afford to make excuses.

60.text: No excuses when you feel pain. And trust me, you will feel it.

67.text: And all you wanna do is give up.

68.text: And all you wanna do is give in.

71.text: When you feel like you've given all you got...

74.text: ...you gotta take one more step, you gotta run one more lap, ou gotta throw one more punch.

101.text: Do you think he's coming back?

115.text: This is your beginning but it doesn't have to be your end.

121.text:
You can do nothing without faith!
You are still special.

134.text: Behind every fear is the person you want to be.

136.text: Fear is self-imposed, mean it doesn't exist.

139.text: You create it, you can destroy it.

141.text: You face your fears and become the person you want to be.

143.text: You run from your fears, your not living. You are alive but you not dig in the freedom.

150.text: You are not running the day, the day is running you.

153.text: We all fall down in life. The question is:

159.text: You don't owe these people any more.

170.text: And I've seen now what I would have to become to stop men like him.

174.text: If you make yourself more than just a man...

180.text: ...if you devote yourself to an ideal...

188.text: then you become something else entirely.

194.text: You go after it and you give it all you have.

196.text: If you lose it, at least you tried, man!

198.text: 'I failed' is ten times more overman than someone said 'what if ?'

202.text:
Cos 'what if ?' Never went to the arena! 
That's called courage.

206.text: Now that's the stuff leaders should be made of.

209.text: You think something's wrong maybe it's time to stop. No it's time to move free and further!

212.text: Mentally you must believed before you physically started.

216.text: I choose to rise, not fall!

218.text: I choose to live, not die!

222.text: Not tomorrow, not next week, but right now, right here.

230.text: I will never go home, not without giving everything I have got!

282.text: All you need now is little imagination.

284.text: Will you belive it or not,

287.text: your imagination is preview of your lifetime coming attractions.

291.text: If you can't imagine what it's gonna be,

294.text: don't ever expect physically looking into the mirror and see it.
